ch0007_40_acerola/0101_0701_01_10:
Hiya! It’s me, Acerola, bringing an old royal touch
to Pasio in my Mimikyu costume!
ch0007_40_acerola/0101_0701_02_10:
Trick or treat, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I hope you have some tasty candy for me...or else
I’ve got some spooky tricks up my sleeve for you!
ch0007_40_acerola/7101_0701_01_10: What do you think of my Mimikyu costume?
ch0007_40_acerola/7101_0701_02_10: Isn’t it cute?! I look just like Mimikyu, huh!
ch0007_40_acerola/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m hoping that wearing this costume will help me
understand Mimikyu a little bit better!
ch0007_40_acerola/7102_0701_02_10:
Hm? Oh, I mean all the kids back home at
Aether House!
ch0007_40_acerola/7102_0701_03_10:
I take care of the Pokémon and all the tiny
tots who live there. I’m kind of like a big sister
to them!
ch0007_40_acerola/7103_0701_02_10:
Oh! That’s just how we say hello back where I’m
from in Alola.
ch0007_40_acerola/7103_0701_03_10:
If we did the same thing on Pasio, would people
just shout “Pasio!” to each other to say hi?
ch0007_40_acerola/7103_0701_04_10: Hmm... That would be a little weird!
ch0007_40_acerola/7104_0701_01_10:
Rawr! Trick or treat, trick or treat—give me
something good to eat!
ch0007_40_acerola/7104_0701_02_10:
Hmm... Do you think Ghost-type Pokémon like
candy, too?
ch0007_40_acerola/7104_0701_03_10:
Next time I see one, I’ll try giving it some candy
and see what happens!
ch0007_40_acerola/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
Do you like Ghost-type Pokémon?
ch0007_40_acerola/7105_0701_02_10:
I obviously love them, but I hear they make some
people really afraid!
ch0007_40_acerola/7105_0701_03_10:
To me, they’re so cute and adorable, I just can’t
get enough of them!
ch0007_40_acerola/7105_0701_04_10:
I hope you feel that way,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0007_40_acerola/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh! There you are! I traded some of my candy
to get you this!
ch0007_40_acerola/1701_0701_02_10: Here you go! Don’t worry—I have plenty more!
ch0007_40_acerola/1701_0702_01_10:
It’s not candy, but I thought you’d like it just
the same!
ch0007_40_acerola/2501_0701_01_10:
I heard that a long time ago, there were people
who thought that a new day began when the
sun went down.
ch0007_40_acerola/2501_0701_02_10:
I’ve always liked nighttime the most, so that
lifestyle seems pretty cool to me!
ch0007_40_acerola/2501_0701_03_10:
Mimikyu and other Ghost types would probably
love that, too, huh!
ch0007_40_acerola/2501_0701_04_10:
If you preferred nighttime, too, that would be
the best!
ch0007_40_acerola/2501_0702_01_10:
Just think! Sunset wouldn’t mark the end of a
day—it would mark the beginning!
ch0007_40_acerola/2501_0702_02_10:
Wouldn’t that be great? We could hang out
together even more after the sun goes down!
ch0007_40_acerola/2511_0701_02_10:
My Mimikyu is usually really shy and reserved
around others...
ch0007_40_acerola/2511_0701_03_10:
but when he’s battling alongside your Pokémon,
he looks like he’s having so much fun!
ch0007_40_acerola/2511_0701_04_10:
You and your partner always look so excited
on the battlefield. It must rub off on Mimikyu and
me, too!
ch0007_40_acerola/2511_0702_01_10:
Mimikyu really does look happy whenever we’re
hanging out with you!
ch0007_40_acerola/2511_0702_02_10: Maybe he can tell how much fun I’m having, too!
ch0007_40_acerola/3001_0701_01_10:
G’morning! I’ve got so much energy today!
Come on, let’s go have some fun!
ch0007_40_acerola/3003_0701_01_10:
Hiya! I always feel so peppy this time of day.
It’s the best time to go for a stroll!
ch0007_40_acerola/3005_0701_01_10:
Nighttime is definitely my time!
I’m ready to go out and have some more fun!
